title: Coconut chicken noodle soup
description: Sayonara packet soups! Coconut, chilli chicken soup that takes 5 minutes to make.Each serving provides 478kcal, 42g protein, 60g carbohydrate (of which 13g sugars), 7g fat (of which 2g saturates), 4g fibre and 3.2g salt.
ingredients: 200ml/7fl oz chicken stock made with ½ a stock cube
1-2 chicken thighs or drumsticks, skin removed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
